name: Computer Mechanic Simulator 2019
description:
Computer Mechanic Simulator is a great simulator where you can build your top-end computer. It provides a variety of different processors, graphics cards, motherboards and other parts to fit the Assembly for every taste. This program will teach you to understand the structure of the computer, learn more about the processes that occur in it, in order to be able to assemble and disassemble the computer, for only 1.99$, in the future you will save hundreds $! after all, you no longer have to use the services or buy disgusting Assembly.
This simulator presents the physics of wires that can bend and unbend, as in real life, the drawn wires can break.
After you build your PC, you can install the OS on it and play interesting games from the built-in library! Also in the OS is a social network where you can chat with other "bakers"!
Advantages Of Computer Mechanic Simulator:
* Completely original simulator
* Physics of computer parts
* physics of wires
* OS and built-in games
* Social network
* Low price
